about_the_game:
The Only Rule of War: Defend Your Territory!


This is a turn-based strategy shooting game where each turn lasts only a few seconds, offering fast-paced and intense tactical battles! On this battlefield, numbers equal power—build strong units, capture territories, and victory will be within your grasp!


Precisely calculate your unit’s movement, rotation, and collisions to land them in buff zones. At the end of each turn, all units' buffs and damage effects are applied. Can you seize advantageous positions and trap your opponents? Your success depends on strategy, courage, and a little bit of luck!


Strategy and Timing Are Everything


Control the entire battlefield—grow your army while preventing your opponents from getting stronger! Every shot matters, and by mastering physics-based angles and rebounds, even a hopeless situation can turn into a game-changing move!



Game Features


✅ **Fast-Paced Matches, Instant Action** 🎯

Each match lasts around 10 minutes—jump in anytime for a quick game or an intense challenge!



✅ **Easy to Play, Deep in Strategy** 🖱

Control your shots with just the mouse! While the mechanics are simple, true mastery requires careful planning and strategic execution. Complete time and turn challenges to make later stages easier!



✅ **Unlimited Retries, Refine Your Tactics** 🔄

No limits! Whether you're optimizing the fastest clear path or trying extreme counterplays, you can retry as many times as needed to perfect your strategy!



✅ **100 Unique Stages, Endless Challenges** 🎮

The game features **50 main stages + 50 advanced stages**, providing 100 unique battlefields filled with endless tactical possibilities!



✅ **Hidden Achievements Await!** 🏆

Unlock secret achievements as you play—can you discover them all?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 或 AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 1GB or AMD HD 6870 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6500 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB or AMD RX 460 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p
